select new com.jshx.qygjzzhzdbw.entity.KeyPar(t.id, t.responsiblePerson, t.areaName, t.companyName, t.keyPartName) from KeyPar t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.keyPartName like :keyPartName
and t.responsiblePerson like :responsiblePerson
and t.createUserID= :createUserId
and INSTR(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
order by t.createTime desc
